text: Edward Austin Kent (February 19, 1854 â€“ April 15, 1912) was an American architect who worked in Buffalo, New York. Kent died on April 15, 1912 when the RMS Titanic sank and was seen helping women and children into the lifeboats. His body was recovered from the ocean and buried in New York. ==References== Category:1854 births Category:1912 deaths Category:Victims of the RMS Titanic Category:American architects Category:Businesspeople from Maine Category:Businesspeople from Buffalo, New York Category:People from Bangor, Maine
title: Edward Austin Kent
